short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Noko is time tracking, reporting and invoicing that you'll actually use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“My team has gone through four time tracking apps in the last two and a half years…”

That's a quote from one of our customers—and it's something we hear a lot. Your business runs on time. It's the fuel your team uses to start, create, finish projects for yourselves and your clients.

“…Noko is by far the most flexible & easy to use solution we have encountered”

How much easier would your job be, if time tracking was so fast, & easy, & almost fun, that your team did it with pleasure?

“Noko cured my aversions against time tracking.”

We ran a small consulting agency ourselves (total combined experience: 24 years!). And we hated the tools we had to use to run it.

That's why we designed Noko Time Tracking from the ground up to help you & your team get every last drop from your daily allotment of 480 business minutes… without stress, without nagging, without wasted seconds.

When you use Noko to track your time, you get the benefit of using a tool designed to help you get the most of your business, to understand… team member utilization, work rhythms, budget accuracy and
client and project overhead (unbillable time), all in addition to all the features you've come to expect:

* “Ridiculously easy time tracking that our team actually uses”—feedback from a customer
* Support from the people that actually make Freckle, including the designers and founders
* No installation, hourly backups and 99.99% uptime
* Multi-currency invoicing
* Powerful reporting
* Track unbillable time
* Web, Mac, iPhone, and Chrome apps
* Freckle Mobile—access Freckle on mobile web browsers
* PDF, Excel & CSV export
* Two-click importing of data from other time tracking apps
* Track time from Github & Beanstalk
* Modern, restful API & connects to thousands 3rd-party apps through Zapier

Don't have an account yet? Sign up for a free trial at https://nokotime.com
